message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, and see how the game goes!
You started high, I'll start low. Your turn to negotiate!
I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet in the middle?
You're still too high, Alice. Meet me in the middle, and we can end this!
I'm willing to give a bit more. How about we meet in the middle, but a bit closer to my original offer?
